sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for classic and skate ski today, February 28, 2025. There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125. Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails. No trails on the golf course.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: –  Due to the warm, rainy weather, trails have deteriorated and are not suitable for skiing.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Good skiing on bucks today 12 to 2 till warm weather hit.  Still plenty of snow on trail.  Can still ski from clubhouse and into woods.  Double track on most of the trail  Should be good for next few days with colder weather.

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: Skied Stony Creek late in the afternoon on Friday 2/21.  The Golf Course trails to the East of the parking lot was rolled and classic tracks groomed.  They generally groom early on Saturdays for weekend visitors.  Snow was equal to the best you will see in SE lower MI.  Did not ski the trails in the woods West of the parking lot.The park closes at 8:00 PM, so it might be possible to get in some night skiing.  Warmer temps and rain are coming.  Enjoy Stony Creek NOW>

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Lovely blue sky Spring skiing on the Red and Blue loops today . Surprisingly little wind debris . The trail and groom is holding well.  The skate had a bit of suck : but I had rilled and LF 8 worked well.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 6 lifts, the Space Worm, and the Rope Tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open with good coverage. Trails will be groomed and tracked tomorrow morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: Nearly an inch of snow has fallen at Nub's this morning and it continues to snow on top of the machine groomed snow. The forecast is calling for some snow to continue to fall today. The snow coverage and depth are very good on all of our snowmaking runs, it still feels like the middle of winter at Nub's Nob. Pintail Peak Lodge is open until 3:30 PM with a deli and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
